get.description:
Get K-line information
priceType: Price type, optional values:
PRICE_TYPE_LAST: Latest price
PRICE_TYPE_ASK_BEST: Best ask price
PRICE_TYPE_BID_BEST: Best bid price
PRICE_TYPE_MARK: Mark price
PRICE_TYPE_ORACLE: Oracle price
klineType: Time type, optional values:
MINUTE_1: 1 minute
MINUTE_5: 5 minutes
MINUTE_15: 15 minutes
MINUTE_30: 30 minutes
HOUR_1: 1 hour
HOUR_2: 2 hours
HOUR_4: 4 hours
HOUR_6: 6 hours
HOUR_8: 8 hours
HOUR_12: 12 hours
DAY_1: 1 day
WEEK_1: 1 week
MONTH_1: 1 month

get.description:
Establish WebSocket connection
Meanings of the following enum values:
transferReason: 0: Unknown 1: User manually initiated transfer 2: Transfer caused by user deposit 3: Transfer caused by user withdrawal
marginMode: 0: Unknown 1: Cross margin mode 2: Isolated margin mode
timeInForce: 0: Unknown 1: GOOD_TIL_CANCEL 2: FILL_OR_KILL 3: IMMEDIATE_OR_CANCEL 4: POST_ONLY
triggerType: 0: Unknown 1: Stop-loss conditional order. If is_buy=false, then current price <= triggerPrice triggers; if is_buy=true, then current price >= triggerPrice triggers 2: Take-profit conditional order. If is_buy=false, then current price >= triggerPrice triggers; if is_buy=true, then current price <= triggerPrice triggers
priceType: 0: Unknown 1: Last traded price 2: Best ask price 3: Best bid price 4: Oracle price 5: Index price
orderCancelReason: 0: Unknown 1: Order fully filled, automatically cancelled. Essentially also a cancellation reason 2: User actively cancelled 3: Expired cancellation 4: Market order/FOK/IOC/PostOnly order, cancelled due to insufficient fill quantity 5: Cancelled due to not meeting reduceOnly condition 6: Insufficient margin cancellation 7: Cancelled due to liquidation trigger 8: Admin cancellation
General format: {method: 'subscribe/unsubscribe', subscription: {channel: 'xxx'}}
Subscription response: {channel: 'subscriptionResponse', data: {method: 'subscribe/unsubscribe', subscription: {channel: 'xxx'}}}
Subscribe to tradeData: {method: 'subscribe', subscription: { channel: 'tradeData', chainType: 1, chainAddress: 'ethAddress' } }
Unsubscribe from tradeData: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'tradeData', chainType: 1, chainAddress: 'ethAddress' } }
tradeData return data: {'channel': 'tradeData', 'user': 'ethAddress', 'data':{'eventType': 0, 'isSnapshot': true, 'version': '0', 'subaccountList': [{}], 'agentBindingList': [{}] , 'orderList': [{}] , 'collateralList': [{}] , 'positionList': [{}] , 'orderFillTransactionList': [{}] , 'agentBindingCreateList': [{}] , 'agentBindingRemoveList': [{}] }
eventType: 0: Unspecified 1: Agent binding creation event 2: Agent binding removal event 3: Subaccount update event 4: Order update event 5: Position collateral change event 6: Transfer-in update event 7: Transfer-out update event
For details, refer to antx-proto/proto/antx/server/indexer/indexer_event.proto
Subscribe to kline: {'method':'subscribe', 'subscription':{'channel':'kline.PRICE_TYPE_LAST.200001.MINUTE_1/kline.priceType.exchangeId.klineType'}}
Unsubscribe from kline: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'kline.PRICE_TYPE_LAST.200001.MINUTE_1' } }
kline return data: {'channel':'kline','event':'payload','data':[{'klineId':'13743968457917283','exchangeId':'200001','klineType':'MINUTE_1','priceType':'PRICE_TYPE_LAST','klineTime':1749863220000,'trades':'0','size':'0','value':'0','high':'100000.0','low':'100000.0','open':'100000.0','close':'100000.0','makerBuySize':'0','makerBuyValue':'0'}]}
Subscribe to ticker: {method: 'subscribe', subscription: { channel: 'ticker.all/ticker.200001/ticker.exchangeId' } }
Unsubscribe from ticker: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'ticker.all/ticker.200001' } }
ticker return data: {'channel':'ticker','event':'payload','data':[{'exchangeId':'200001','priceChange':'0.00000000','priceChangePercent':'0.00000000','trades':'0','size':'0','value':'0','high':'100000.0','low':'100000.0','open':'100000.0','close':'100000.0','highTime':'1749863220000','lowTime':'1749863220000','startTime':'1749863220000','endTime':'1749863220000','lastPrice':'100000.0','markPrice':'100000.0','indexPrice':'100000.0','openInterest':'0'}]}
Subscribe to depth: {method: 'subscribe', subscription: { channel: 'depth.200001.200/depth.exchangeId.Level' } }
Unsubscribe from depth: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'depth.200001.200' } }
depth return data: {'channel':'depth','event':'payload','data':[{'isSnapshot': true, 'startVersion':'1','endVersion':'1','level':'200','exchangeId':'200001','asks':[{'price':'100000.0','size':'100000.0'}],'bids':[{'price':'100000.0','size':'100000.0'}]}]}
Subscribe to trade: {method: 'subscribe', subscription: { channel: 'trade.200001/trade.exchangeId' } }
Unsubscribe from trade: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'trade.200001' } }
trade return data: {'channel':'trade','event':'payload','data':[{'ticketId':'13743968457917283','exchangeId':'200001','time':'1749863220000','price':'100000.0','size':'100000.0','value':'100000000.0','takerOrderId':'13743968457917283','makerOrderId':'13743968457917283','takerAccountId':'1','makerAccountId':'1', 'isBestMatch':'true', 'isBuyerMaker':'true'}]}
Transaction result push: {'channel':'txResult', 'user':'antxxxx', 'data':{'rawTx':'', 'block':123, 'hash':'0xxxx', 'from':'antxxxx', 'status':'false', 'action':[{'typeUrl':'', 'detail':{}}]}}
Subscribe to funding rate: {method: 'subscribe', subscription: { channel: 'fundingRate.200001/fundingRate.exchangeId' } }
Unsubscribe from funding rate: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'fundingRate.200001' } }
funding rate push: {'channel':'fundingRate','event':'payload','data':[{'exchangeId':'200001','fundingTime':'1749863220000','fundingCalculateTime':'1749863220000','fundingRate':'0.00000000','oraclePrice':'100000.0','markPrice':'100000.0','isSettlement':'false','forecastFundingRate':'0.00000000','previousFundingRate':'0.00000000','previousFundingCalculateTime':'1749863220000','premiumIndex':'0.00000000','avgPremiumIndex':'0.00000000','premiumIndexCalculateTime':'1749863220000','impactMarginNotional':'0.00000000','impactAskPrice':'100000.0','impactBidPrice':'100000.0','interestRate':'0.00000000','predictedFundingRate':'0.00000000','fundingRateIntervalMinutes':'0'}]}
Subscribe to price: {method: 'subscribe', subscription: { channel: 'price.200001/price.exchangeId' } }
Unsubscribe from price: {method: 'unsubscribe', subscription: { channel: 'price.200001' } }
